> ...and for examples on using them well, get a copy of _TDD: A
> Practical Guide_. It's still the only TDD/JUnit book that shows us
> how to test-drive a desktop GUI. 

If I remember correctly, "Unit Testing in Java - How Tests Drive the Code"
also contains a chapter on unit testing Swing applications. You should also
google for Micheal Feather's (?) "humble dialog" article.

For some reason, I didn't like "A Practical Guide" very much, so you might
want to take a look at it before you buy it...

Cheers, Ilja
